channel.title: Prayer altar
channel.description:
Hi all
my server has working prayer but when the prayer is 0 and they wanna recharge it at altar it wont work
how do i fix the altar problem
please help me .

item.title: Prayer altar
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

Yes.

in your client class find packet 132.
then under a switch statement add the resource Rich gave you, if you dont have a switch statement here is one:

switch(objectID) {

}

^ that should be under any if statement.

The resource Rich provided should go before the } on the switch statement.

Extra:

if the following doesnt work:

anim(645);

use the following insted:

setAnimation(645);

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer altar
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Stijn_Scape Owner Stijn Scape
item.description:
@Owner_Stijn_Scape wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:2, topic:248941"] case 61: case 409: case 8749: if (playerLevel[5] == getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) { Message("You already have full prayer points."); return; } anim(645); setSkillLevel(5, getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), playerXP[5]); playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); Message("You recharge your prayer points."); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break;[/quote]

do i need to copie and paste that ?

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer altar
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

case 61: case 409: case 8749: if (playerLevel[5] == getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) { Message("You already have full prayer points."); return; } anim(645); setSkillLevel(5, getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), playerXP[5]); playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); Message("You recharge your prayer points."); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break;
